name: Rendang Daging
description: Meat braised in a coconut milk seasoned with a herb and spice .

name: Nasi Goreng
description: Cooked rice that has been stir-fried in frying pan mixed with eggs, vegetables, seafood, or meat.

name: Ayam Geprek
description: Fried chicken smashed and mixed together with hot and spicy sambal chili paste.

name: Ayam Gulai
description: Chicken cuts that are slowly simmered in a complex, spicy sauce which is based on coconut milk.

name: Mie Goreng
description: Fried noodle dish made with yellow/wheat noodles and tastes sweet and savory.

name: Telur Dadar
description: Indonesian-style omelette that is fluffy and delicious.
